scripts.build: pnpm run compile && pnpm run build-dictionaries
scripts.build-dev: pnpm run compile-dev && pnpm run build-dictionaries
scripts.clean-build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.build-dictionaries: cspell-tools-cli compile -o dist src/php.txt src/companies.txt src/node.txt
scripts.test: pnpm run test-dist && pnpm run test-cspell
